attributes.action: Give more money to the NHS and mental health services instead of spending on war
attributes.additional_details: Statistics show that 1 in 4 people in the UK have experienced mental health issues and everyone needs health care at some point in their lives, including politicians.
attributes.background: I would like to create this petition to the government about spending more money on our NHS and mental health services in the UK, rather than spending it on war and creating even more violence in this world.
